page.title: 13My Typical Sunday
page.content: Every Sunday I get up at 8.00a.m.My breakfast is usually cornflakes and a piece of toast.I help to feed the cats and hens and our horse. At 10.15 we set off to church for the 10.30 service. At 11.00 I go to Mrs.Simpson in the Sunday school.We sometimes have coffee, orange and biscuits afterwards.When we get home I get changed and play outside until lunch is ready. We usually have either roast beef,lamb or chicken.After lunch I play outside with my two sisters or if raining we play monopoly.For tea we have sandwiches.We sometimes play tennis against dad after tea or play on the climbing frame.At 8.45 we all go inside and have our baths before we go to bed at 9.15 for a read and then we go to sleep at 9.30.
